Details: Gain a new combat feat and a new exploration feat.

While not transformed, gain 1 emotion at the start of each turn. Then, you may pay 3*emotion essence to Transform. (Emotion you cannot pay for is lost.) While transformed, lose 1 emotion at the end of each turn. Your transformation ends when you reach 0 emotion.
Choose an emotion subclass. Gain a unique transformation.
Whenever you lose life or land a critical hit, gain 1 stack of emotion.
At the start of each of your turns, make a difficulty 10 Presence (Endurance) skill check. If you succeed, remove one stack of an ailment of your choice from yourself.

After you make a skill check using a skill you are proficient in and see the initial results, you may choose to treat the result as if you had rolled a 15 instead, but gain 1 stacks of exhaustion for doing so. You cannot use this on death's door skill checks.
Increase one Attribute of your choice by 1.
Gain a new combat feat and a new exploration feat.
Subclass emotion dump. (Use the last iteration for inspiration)

Increase one Attribute of your choice by 1.
Gain a new combat feat and a new exploration feat.
Ignore all exhaustion penalties applied to Endurance skill checks.
Whenever you complete a rest, remove an additional stack of exhaustion.
Increase one Attribute of your choice by 1.
Gain a new combat feat and a new exploration feat.
